snippet: The Second Chance Act has brought about important changes, but a lot more rethinking is needed.
abstract: Editorial highlights ways in which federal Second Chance Act has spurred states to find creative ways to cut prison costs by making sure that people who are released from prison do not return; calls on federal and state governments to take additional steps to prune regulatory thicket that denies ex-convicts access to society.
lead_paragraph: The Second Chance Act has brought about important changes, but a lot more rethinking is needed.
